title: League of Legends Logo Stuck
body: The league of legends logo is stuck when I try and boot up pbe, I still get leaver bustered for afking and it has happened to me and my friends multiple time. I don't want to be put in low queue by a company that won't fix their bugs.

replies.body:
The PBE is a beta testing ground for new and experimental code. You should not expect this to be a stable platform. Try playing on the regular server.

Additionally, you're posting from your OCE account.
